author: hwright
msg: Rev the client diff APIs to add the ignore-mergeinfo flag.

author: cmpilato
msg: New remotely usable svnmerge history migration script for folks who
lack direct server-side repository access and want to do piecemeal
migration of svnmerge.py tracking data.  Checkout a depth-empty
working copy of the branch you wish to convert, run this script
on it, review the results, and either commit or revert.

author: gstein
msg: Resurrect the old SQLite utility functions from r29035. These used to be
FS-specific, but are now moved into libsvn_subr as svn-internal functions.
A few new error codes have been resurrected, too, and renamed appropriately.
The header and implementation have been renamed away from the FS label. A
new type (svn_sqlite__db_t) was introduced so that clients would not need
to include the sqlite3.h header file, thus limiting the sqlite exposure.
The schema handling has also been switched to a more generic mechanism,
allowing for multiple clients to use SQLite databases.
Note: the .c file has guards around the code to prevent a "hard"
dependency upon SQLite at this time. ENABLE_SQLITE_TESTING must be
(manually) defined in order to compile this code into libsvn_subr.

author: hwright
msg: Rename the ignore-prop-mods branch to the ignore-mergeinfo branch.
At this point, the branch is specifically about allowing st, diff, and log
to ignore mergeinfo mods, and the branch name should reflect that.

author: pburba
msg: Fix a bug and greatly improve merge performance in a common use case.
Quite a while back glasser pointed out that the code to filter
self-referential mergeinfo was a performance hog - see
found a merge bug where this filtering code removed valid mergeinfo - see
This change implements glasser's suggestion, which also fixes the problem
svn_client__get_history_as_mergeinfo() one time per incoming mergeinfo
merge source rather than svn_client__repos_locations() for each discrete
range in each merge source's rangelist.
